TopicTitle: Remove flags from "Flights in Progress" at save load menu.

Articles.Content:
Simple, really.

Seems misleading to me - they aren't really 'flights' - and they quickly bloat the number.

It is currently done with Debris, why not flags too?
You can always filter them out yourself, y'know.

You can always filter them out yourself, y'know.

While this may work for the Tracking Station view, in reality the Load saved game menu will still count flags towards the total number of concurrent flights.

You can always filter them out yourself, y'know.

Problem is, you can only filter in one ship at a time, and you can't filter out a single type of ship.
^ Right click the category icon in the tracking station or map view.

While this may work for the Tracking Station view, in reality the Load saved game menu will still count flags towards the total number of concurrent flights.
Well, that I can agree with. They're not flights, and they're not "active" per se, so yeah.

Heh, I was meaning to suggest not adding flags or bases to the "flights in progress" counter today.

So basically, +1.
Yes, this is kinda confusing. I was really scared when I saw flight in progress after really long and complicated returning mission.

I just wanted to post and agree with this comment - I would still leave Bases as "flights" though; although they're not "flying", they ARE still missions.

BUT....having flags on the "flights" list is a bit irritating as I've currently got 14 flags spread across a number of planets and it really bloats my flight number from what the number of flights REALLY is.

+1 to you good sir. Please think about doing this SQUAD!
I fully support this suggestion. Flags are not flights and so they should not count for the "Flights in progress" in the list of saves.

Well even without the flags issue, "Flights" aren't even flights either, if you catch my meaning. Space stations get called "flights' when they're not. Landed rovers get called "flights" when they're not, and so on. Really the core problem here isn't flags. It's that the vocabulary term "flights" is incorrectly used for things ALL OVER the place in the game, not just for flags. Really it should be "Vessels" (what they are in the save file), or "craft". You don't have 210 "flights" in your save game. You have 210 "vessels" in your saved game.

On the topic of map view bloat and start screen flight bloat, I think it would be useful to have different classes,

Possibly

Active craft,

Flags,

permanent orbiting stations and satellites,

Bases.

I`d like to set whether any craft appears in the list or not for any craft. "Ignore this craft/vessel whatever you want to call it". I have stations that I will never move or control again but they are part of my comms network. I`d like them also to have an option of not bloating my map view whilst continuing operation without having to call them debris or a flag...
